title: (x) Sferra Bros. - Hogarth Script, Adobe Garamond {Franz}
author: franz

comments.content:
Wanda, because of the age of the logo, typeface could be predigital. Check out Mikes Script's pages.   
   
 [http://bowfinprintworks.com/Script10Pg1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124208/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script10Pg1.html)

I agree with Franz's ID as Hogarth Script. The section of the Script Font ID Guide for this kind of script is [Part 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124208/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script01Pg1.html) and Hogarth is on the second page.
